review: My mother had to be operated in Lateral border of tongue, As she had other heart related ailments, we are worried about the operation, however after meeting Dr Mathan Mohan all our worries disappeared, He operated successfully also explained in detail about the post surgery procedure as well, he is always reachable and available for any clarification. Excellent and very talented Doctor, also very friendly as well :)) Wishing success in his professional life to save many life. Thanks
